cause.description:
The H.G.J.A.A.K.L foundation (Help get Jed Arangies a kiff life) is dedicated to helping our friend who is in great need...
Can you spare him some kiffness?
1. His life is cruel
2. Lets get him another one
3. pencil sharpener
cause.mission: help Jed get a kiff life
cause.name: The H.G.J.A.A.K.L Foundation
